en.voxelamming.name: Voxelamming
en.voxelamming.setNode: Set node at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL]
en.voxelamming.animateNode: Animate node at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] scale: [SCALE] interval: [INTERVAL]
en.voxelamming.createBox: Create voxel at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] r: [R] g: [G] b: [B] alpha: [ALPHA]
en.voxelamming.removeBox: Remove voxel at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z]
en.voxelamming.writeSentence: Write [SENTENCE] at x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] r: [R] g: [G] b: [B] alpha: [ALPHA]

ja.voxelamming.name: ボクセラミング
ja.voxelamming.setRoomName: ルームネームを [ROOMNAME] にする
ja.voxelamming.setNode: ノードを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] に配置する。角度を pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] にする
ja.voxelamming.animateNode: アニメーション移動 x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] 。回転 pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] 。拡大: [SCALE] 移動時間: [INTERVAL]
ja.voxelamming.createBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] に作成する。色 r: [R] g: [G] b: [B] alpha: [ALPHA]
ja.voxelamming.removeBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] から削除する
ja.voxelamming.setBoxSize: ボクセルサイズを [BOXSIZE] にする
ja.voxelamming.setBuildInterval: ボクセルの作成間隔を [INTERVAL] 秒にする
ja.voxelamming.writeSentence: [SENTENCE] を x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] に書く。色 r: [R] g: [G] b: [B] alpha: [ALPHA]

ja-Hira.voxelamming.setNode: ノードを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] におく。かくどを pitch: [PITCH] yaw: [YAW] roll: [ROLL] にする

ja-Hira.voxelamming.createBox: ボクセルを x: [X] y: [Y] z: [Z] につくる。いろ r: [R] g: [G] b: [B] alpha: [ALPHA]

ja-Hira.voxelamming.setBoxSize: ボクセルサイズを [BOXSIZE] にする
